en.modalsubtext: At the moment, the site is still not ready. Clicking on "OK" will take you to the English version.
en.havefun: What language do you want to have fun in?
en.tjppd: Long gone are quiet nights in watching the same old TV shows ‚Äì The Jackbox Party Pack is here! Experience five fun games in one great pack ‚Äì giving you the perfect excuse for rounding up friends, family and fellow gamers for a few hours of gaming delight ‚Äì whatever the day, whatever the occasion. You‚Äôre gonna need more than one party for this.
en.screenblocker: Unfortunately, this screen scale isn"t supported!
en.jackboxbaltic: Jackbox Baltic United is the site where we upload unofficial Estonian, Latvian and Lithuanian translations for the games of Jackbox Games, known for being the creators of the Jackbox Party Pack. We are just starting our way into localization of games, so you can help us by joining our team on the discord server!
en.aboutjgd: Jackbox Games is a small game production studio from Chicago (Illinois). The most famous franchise - You Don't Know Jack - has been released since 1995, and even existed as a TV show. Being a part of Jellyvision, in 2013 the company separated and was named Jackbox Games. In addition to The Jackbox Party Pack franchise, a variety of games are released, for example - Quiplash, Fibbage, Trivia Murder Party.
en.contd: If you have a question, a suggestion or just want to chat, the best way to get in touch is via:
en.discorddi: Jackbox Baltic United is the site where we upload unofficial Estonian, Latvian, and Lithuanian translations for the games of Jackbox Games, known for being the creators of the Jackbox Party Pack. We are just starting our way into game localization, so you can help us by joining our team on the Discord server!
en.howtoplayd: So, you want to play Jackbox Games! Great choice.
en.s1t1: Getting started is easy! For Jackbox games, your phone or tablet is the controller and up to 8 people can play. Sometimes more! The main action of the game happens on your TV (or wherever you launched the game), but players use their own mobile devices to input answers and make choices.
en.s1t2: All Jackbox games are rated T For Teen. Many games have a family-friendly mode that can be turned on in the game‚Äôs settings menu, which brings the game closer to an E10+ rating!
en.s1t3: Remember, only one person in your group needs to own a Jackbox product in order to host the game.
en.s2h1: LAUNCH THE GAME AND GRAB A MOBILE DEVICE
en.s2t1: Once you launch and pick the game you want to play, you‚Äôll see a four-letter room code in the lobby.
en.s2t2: To join, each player uses their phone or tablet and goes to jackbox.tv, then choose the language you are playing in, using whatever web browser you normally use.
en.s3h1: ENTER THE ROOM CODE AT JACKBOX.TV
en.s3t1: Once you‚Äôre there, enter that four-letter room code on your mobile device.
en.s3t2: Then, enter whatever name you want to use in the game. Hit the PLAY button, and you should be connected!
en.s3t3: In The Jackbox Party Pack 9, you can also connect by pointing your phone camera at the QR code in the lobby and then following the URL that appears.
en.s3t4: If you get disconnected during a game, refresh your browser. This fixes most disconnects!
en.s4t1: The very first person to connect is the VIP. When everyone who wants to play is connected and ready, the VIP can start the game from their device.
en.s4t2: If you‚Äôve enabled the ‚ÄúStart Game from Controller Only‚Äù setting (in the game‚Äôs settings menu), you‚Äôll need to press the button shown onscreen to begin.
en.s4t3: NOTE: ‚ÄúEverybody‚Äôs In‚Äù or ‚ÄúStart Game‚Äù will only appear on the screen if you have enough players to begin a game.
en.q1: Why do I get a black screen after installing my translation?
en.a1: If the screen goes black after installing the translation, it means that your version is pirated. Pirated versions are often outdated and do not have the same file structure as current versions. We can only encourage you to get a legitimate version.
en.q2: I want to play. Where do I get the room code?
en.a2:
There are two options:

  • to start yourself ‚Äì you need to buy the game on Steam, install our translation and then proceed according to the manual.
  • to find someone else's game ‚Äî you DON't need to buy and install the game, just find out the room code and go through jackbox.tv, then watch the gameplay where you got the code.

Once again: the purchased and installed game is needed only by the one who starts (the host).
He and the rest of the participants join the game from their browsers (phones, tablets or computers) via Jackbox.TV, you don't need to install anything else.
en.q3: I bought a Party Pack on the Epic Games Store, how do I download the translation?
en.a3: Apologies, but we are currently doing translations of the Steam version.
en.q4: I found an error in one of the translations. Where can I report it?
en.a4:
In the üîπÔ∏ômistakes channel of the Discord server.
If possible, do not skimp on the details. This makes it easier to find the problem.
en.tjpsd: Jackbox Party Starter is an indispensable party game! This pack contains three updated games: Quiplash 3, Tee K.O. and Trivia Murder Party 2.
en.tjppstext:
Our translation is released for Windows OS based version of Steam (+ Humble/Fanatical). Other platforms (Epic Games) have not been tested.
On this page you can get a modification that adds a language to the game. Please note that not all games are translated and there may be errors or inaccuracies. However you can help us by entering the Discord Server.
To download the translation you need to have the game on Steam. We do not support piracy and will not help!
en.tjpp3d: The threequel to the party game phenomenon features the deadly quiz show Trivia Murder Party, the say-anything sequel Quiplash 2, the surprising survey game Guesspionage, the t-shirt slugfest Tee K.O., and the sneaky trickster game Fakin‚Äô It.
en.l1p: We (hereinafter referred to as JBU) strive to create high-quality translations of The Jackbox Party Pack franchises (hereinafter referred to as the game) for your enjoyment and convenience. Our goal is to make these games accessible to everyone who does not speak the original language of Jackbox Games (hereinafter referred to as the developer). However, we want to openly and honestly declare our disclaimer and the terms of use for our translations.
en.l2p: JBU is not an official representative of the game developers and does not have their permission for translation. Our translations are a creative effort by participants and are based on their skills and knowledge. Please remember that we do not have any official status with respect to these games.
en.l3p: During the translation and adaptation process, errors or discrepancies may occur. We make every effort to ensure the quality of our translations, but we cannot guarantee their flawless accuracy. Please understand that some issues may arise.
en.l4p: We strongly disapprove of the pirated distribution of games. Our translations are intended only for users who own original copies of the games. Please comply with the law and respect the intellectual property of the game developers.
en.l5p: Our team may periodically update the translations to improve quality or correct errors. We do not commit to supporting outdated versions of the translations.
en.l6p: By using our translations, you do so at your own risk. Risks include compatibility and stability, legality, updates, and support. We are not responsible for any damage that may occur as a result of using our translations.
en.l7p: We hope that our efforts will help you enjoy the games in your native language, but we ask you to adhere to the above-mentioned terms and understand that we are not official representatives of the developers. Thank you for your support and understanding.

ee.modalsubtext: Sait ei ole veel valmis. "OK" nupp suunab sind t√∂√∂tavale inglisekeelsele saidile.
ee.tjppd: Vaiksed √µhtud vanu telesarju vaadates on minevik, sest n√º√ºd on v√µimalik saada endale Jackbox Party Pack! Naudi viis erinevat peom√§ngu √ºhes - ideaalne vabandus s√µprade, pere v√µi muu seltskonna kokkukutsumiseks, et veeta m√µni tund lahedalt m√§ngides - s√µltumata p√§evast ja s√ºndmusest. Sul on vaja rohkem kui √ºhte pidu selleks.
ee.oopsd: At the moment, we don't have a translation of this game.
ee.jackboxbaltic: Jackbox Baltic United on veebileht, kuhu me laeme √ºles mitteametlikud eesti-, l√§ti- ja leedukeelsed t√µlked Jackbox Games m√§ngudele, tuntud kui Jackbox Party Pack'i loojad. Oleme alles oma t√µlketeekonna alguses, seega v√µid meile appi tulla meie Discordi serveris!
ee.aboutjgd: Jackbox Games on Chicagos asuv v√§ike m√§ngutegijate stuudio. Nende kuulsaim frantsiis - Sa ei tea mitte Essugi - on avaldatud alates 1995. aastast, mille all oli ka kunagi telesaade. 2013. aastal, olles seni olnud osa firmast Jellyvision, registreeris Jackbox Games ennast eraldi firmaks. Lisaks Jackbox Party Pack frantsiisile on stuudio mitmeid erinevaid m√§nge avaldanud, nende seas Kavalusekott, Luiskard ja M√µrvaviktoriinipralle.
ee.contd: K√ºsimuste v√µi ettepanekute puhul saab √ºhendust meiega:
ee.discorddi: Jackbox Baltic United on veebileht, kuhu me laeme √ºles mitteametlikud eesti-, l√§ti- ja leedukeelsed t√µlked Jackbox Games m√§ngudele, tuntud ka kui Jackbox Party Packi loojatena. Oleme alles oma t√µlketeekonna alguses, seega v√µid meile appi tulla meie Discordi serveris!
ee.howtoplayd: Ehk siis soovid m√§ngida Jackbox Games m√§nge? Ideaalne valik.
ee.s1t1: M√§ngu alustamine on imelihtne! Jackbox Games m√§ngude m√§ngimisel kasutad oma nutiseadet (telefoni, tahvlit v√µi arvutit) ja koos saab m√§ngida 8 inimest, kuid vahel veel rohkemgi! P√µhitegevus toimub teleka v√µi arvuti ekraanil, aga m√§ngijad kasutavad oma nutiseadet vastuse sisestamiseks ja h√§√§letamiseks.
ee.s1t2: K√µik Jackbox Games m√§ngud on reitinguga T for Teen. Mitmel m√§ngul on s√§tetes ka peres√µbralik re≈æiim, mis tekitab reitinguks E10+!
ee.s1t3: Meelespea: ainult √ºks inimene peab omama m√§ngu, et m√§ngu alustada.
ee.s2t1: Kui oled m√§ngu v√§lja valinud ja avanud, siis tekib ekraanile neljakohaline ruumikood.
ee.s2t2: Ruumiga √ºhinemiseks iga m√§ngija l√§heb nutiseadmel veebilehele jackbox.tv.
ee.s3t1: Oma nutiseadmega veebilehel olles, sisesta neljakohaline ruumikood.
ee.s3t2: Seej√§rel vali enda ekraaninimi, vajuta M√ÑNGI ja sa oled m√§ngus sees!
ee.s3t3: Jackbox Party Pack 9 m√§ngus on v√µimalik √ºhineda m√§nguga ekraanilolevat QR-koodi sk√§nnides.
ee.s3t4: Kui √ºhendus kaob, siis v√§rskenda oma brauser - lahendus enamus probleemidele!
ee.s4t1: Ruumiga esimesena liitunud m√§ngija on VIP. Kui k√µik m√§ngijad on ruumis ja valmis m√§ngima, VIP saab alustada m√§ngu oma nutiseadmest.
ee.s4t2: Kui oled valinud s√§tetest "Alusta m√§ngu kontrolleriga", siis m√§ngu peab alustama ekraanile ilmuvast nupust.
ee.s4t3: NB! "K√ïIK ON SEES" v√µi "ALUSTA M√ÑNGU" valikud ilmuvad ekraanile ainult juhul, kui ruumis on piisavalt m√§ngijaid.
ee.q1: Miks on ekraan must peale t√µlke allalaadimist?
ee.a1: Juhul, kui teie ekraan mustaks l√§heb peale t√µlke allalaadimist, on teie m√§ng piraaditud. Paraku piraaditud versioonid ei pruugi olla regulaarselt uuendatud, seega failistruktuurid ei pruugi √ºhtida. Siinkohal julgustame teid siiski m√§ngu ostma.
ee.a2:
M√§ngimiseks on kaks valikut:

  • ise ruumi alustamiseks ‚Äì hangi m√§ng Steamist, lae alla meie t√µlge ja j√§rgi juhendis olevaid juhtn√∂√∂re.
  • m√§ngida olemasolevas ruumis ‚Äî ei pea m√§ngu alla laadima! Lihtsalt k√ºsi m√§ngu alustajalt ruumikoodi, √ºhine lehelt jackbox.tv, ning vaata ekraani, kus m√§ngu n√§idatakse.

Sellisel juhul on ainult m√§ngu alustajal vaja omada ning alla laadida m√§ng.
Alustaja ning teised m√§ngijad √ºhinevad l√§bi oma nutiseadmete (telefonide, tahvlite v√µi arvutite) lehek√ºljel jackbox.TV ‚Äì midagi pole vaja alla laadida.
ee.q3: Ostsin Party Packi Epic Games poest, kuidas ma t√µlke saan alla laadida?
ee.a3: Hetkel on t√µlked saadaval Steami versioonidele.
ee.q4: Ma leidsin t√µlkes vea. Kus ma saan sellest teada anda?
ee.a4:
Vigadest saab teada anda meie Discordi serveris kanalis üîπÔ∏ômistakes.
V√µimaluse korral olge detailsed, nii saame probleemi kiiremini lahendatud.
ee.l1p: Meie (edaspidi "JBU") p√º√ºdleme selle nimel, et luua kvaliteetseid t√µlkeid Jackbox Party Packi frantsiisidest (edaspidi "m√§ng"), teile meelelahutuseks ja mugavuseks. Meie eesm√§rk on teha need m√§ngud k√§ttesaadavaks k√µigile, kes ei r√§√§gi Jackbox Gamesi (edaspidi "arendaja") originaalkeeli. Tahame siiski avalikult ja ausalt deklareerida oma vastutuse lahti√ºtlemist ja meie t√µlgete kasutustingimusi.
ee.l2p: JBU ei ole m√§nguarendajate ametlik esindaja ja meil puudub nende luba t√µlkimiseks. Meie t√µlked on asjaosaliste loominguline j√µupingutus ja p√µhinevad nende oskustel ja teadmistel. Palun pidage meeles, et meil ei ole nende m√§ngude suhtes mingit ametlikku staatust.
ee.l3p: T√µlkimise ja kohandamise k√§igus v√µib esineda vigu v√µi lahknevusi. Me teeme k√µik endast oleneva, et tagada meie t√µlgete kvaliteet, kuid me ei saa garanteerida nende veatut t√§psust. Palun m√µistke, et m√µned t√µrked v√µivad tekkida.
ee.l4p: Me m√µistame s√ºgavalt hukka m√§ngude ebaseadusliku levitamise. Meie t√µlked on m√µeldud ainult neile kasutajatele, kes omavad m√§ngude originaalkoopiaid. Palun j√§rgige seadust ja austage m√§nguarendajate intellektuaalset omandit.
ee.l5p: Meie meeskond v√µib t√µlkeid perioodiliselt uuendada, et parandada kvaliteeti v√µi parandada vigu. Me ei v√µta endale kohustust toetada vananenud t√µlkeversioone.
ee.l6p: Kasutades meie t√µlkeid teete seda omal vastutusel. Riskid h√µlmavad √ºhilduvust ja stabiilsust, √µigusp√§rasust, uuendusi ja tuge. Me ei vastuta v√µimalike kahjude eest, mis v√µivad tekkida meie t√µlgete kasutamise tagaj√§rjel.
ee.l7p: Loodame, et meie j√µupingutused aitavad teil m√§nge oma emakeeles nautida, kuid palume teil j√§rgida √ºlalnimetatud tingimusi ja m√µista, et me ei ole arendajate ametlikud esindajad. T√§name teid toetuse ja m√µistmise eest.
ee.tjppstext:
Meie t√µlked on avaldatud Windowsi operatsioonis√ºsteemil p√µhinevale Steami versioonile (+ Humble/Fanatical). Teisi platvorme (Epic Games) ei ole testitud.
Sellel lehek√ºljel saate versiooni, mis lisab m√§ngule vastava keele. Siinkohal mainime, et k√µik m√§ngud ei ole t√µlgitud ja t√µlkes v√µib esineda vigu v√µi ebat√§psusi, milles saate meid aidata, kui √ºhinete meie Discord serveriga.
T√µlke allalaadimiseks peab teil olema m√§ng Steamis. Me ei toeta piraatlust ja ei aita!

lv.howtoplayd: TƒÅtad, gribi spƒìlƒìt Jackbox Games! Lieliska izvƒìle.
lv.s1t1: SƒÅkt ir viegli! Jackbox Games spƒìlƒìs tƒÅlrunis vai plan≈°etdators ir kontrolieris, un spƒìlƒìt var lƒ´dz pat 8 cilvƒìkiem. Da≈æreiz arƒ´ vairƒÅk! Spƒìles galvenƒÅ darbƒ´ba notiek ekranƒÅ (jebkurƒÅ vietƒÅ, kur esi uzsƒÅcis spƒìli), bet spƒìlƒìtƒÅji izmanto savas mobilƒÅs ierƒ´ces, lai ievadƒ´tu atbildes un izdarƒ´tu izvƒìli.
lv.s1t2: Visas Jackbox spƒìles tiek vƒìrtƒìtas ‚Äò16+‚Äô. DaudzƒÅm spƒìlƒìm ir ƒ£imenei draudzƒ´gs re≈æƒ´ms, ko var ieslƒìgt spƒìles iestatƒ´jumu izvƒìlnƒì, tƒÅdƒìjƒÅdi tuvinot spƒìli ‚Äò7+‚Äô vecuma grupƒÅ!
lv.s1t3: ≈Öem vƒìrƒÅ, ka tikai vienai personai tavƒÅ grupƒÅ ir jƒÅb≈´t Jackbox precei, lai varƒìtu rƒ´kot spƒìli.

lv.s2t2: Lai pievienotos, katrs spƒìlƒìtƒÅjs, izmantojot tƒÅlruni vai plan≈°etdatoru, dodas uz vietni jackbox.lv, un izmanto jebkuru pƒÅrl≈´kprogrammu, ko tava sirds vƒìlas.
lv.s3t1: Kad jau esi tur, ierƒ´cƒì ievadi ƒçetru burtu telpas kodu.
lv.s3t2: Pƒìc tam ievadi vƒÅrdu, ko velies izmantot spƒìlƒì. Nospiedi pogu SPƒíLET, un tu b≈´si jau tur!
lv.s3t3: The Jackbox Party Pack 9 var arƒ´ pieslƒìgties caura tƒÅlru≈Üa kameru pavƒìr≈°ot uz kvadrƒÅtkodu lobijƒÅ un pƒìc tam sekojot parƒÅdƒ´tajam URL adreses nosaukumam.
lv.s3t4: Ja spƒìles laikƒÅ tiek pƒÅrtraukts savienojums, atsvaidzini pƒÅrl≈´kprogrammu. Tas novƒìr≈° lielƒÅko daƒºu atvieno≈°anƒÅs gadƒ´jumu!
lv.s4t1: PirmƒÅ persona, kas pieslƒìdzas, ir VIP. Kad visi, kas vƒìlas spƒìlƒìt, ir pieslƒìgu≈°ies un gatavi, VIP var sƒÅkt spƒìli no savas ierƒ´ces.
lv.s4t2: Ja esi aktivizƒìjis iestatƒ´jumu "SƒÅkt spƒìli tikai no kontroliera" (spƒìles iestatƒ´jumu izvƒìlnƒì), lai sƒÅktu spƒìli, ir jƒÅnospie≈æ ekrƒÅnƒÅ redzamƒÅ poga.
lv.s4t3: PIEZƒ™ME: "Visi ir ≈°eit" vai "SƒÅktu spƒìli" uz ekrƒÅna parƒÅdƒ´sies tikai tad, ja b≈´s pietiekami daudz spƒìlƒìtƒÅju, lai sƒÅktu spƒìli.
lv.q1: KƒÅpƒìc pƒìc tulkojuma instalƒì≈°anas parƒÅdƒÅs melnais ekrƒÅns?
lv.a1: Ja pƒìc tulkojuma instalƒì≈°anas ekrƒÅns kƒº≈´st melns, tas nozƒ´mƒì, ka tava versija ir pirƒÅtiska. PirƒÅtiskƒÅs versijas bie≈æi vien ir novecoju≈°as, un to failu strukt≈´ra nav tƒÅda pati kƒÅ pa≈°reizƒìjƒÅm versijƒÅm. Mƒìs varam tikai ieteikt iegƒÅdƒÅties likumƒ´gu versiju.
lv.q2: Es gribu spƒìlƒìt. Kur es varu ieg≈´t telpas kodu?
lv.a2:
Ir divas iespƒìjas:

  • pats sƒÅkt spƒìli ‚Äì tev ir jƒÅiegƒÅdƒÅjies spƒìle vietnƒì Steam, jƒÅieinstalƒì m≈´su tulkojumu un pƒìc tam rƒ´kojas ar rokasgrƒÅmatu.
  • atrast kƒÅda cita spƒìli ‚Äî tev NAV nepiecie≈°ams pirkt un instalƒìt spƒìli, vienkƒÅr≈°i uzzini telpas kodu un dodies uz jackbox.lv, tad skaties spƒìli, kur esi sa≈Üƒìmis kodu.

AtkƒÅrto≈°u: iegƒÅdƒÅtƒÅ un instalƒìtƒÅ spƒìle ir nepiecie≈°ama tikai tam, kur≈° sƒÅk spƒìli (ƒ´pa≈°niekam).
i≈Ü≈° un pƒÅrƒìjie dalƒ´bnieki pievienojas spƒìlei no savas pƒÅrl≈´kprogrammas (tƒÅlru≈Üa, plan≈°etdatora vai datora), izmantojot Jackbox.LV, tev nekas cits nav jƒÅinstalƒì.
lv.q3: Es iegƒÅdƒÅjos Party Pack Epic Games veikalƒÅ, kƒÅ lejupielƒÅdƒìt tulkojumu?
lv.a3: Atvainojiet, bet pa≈°laik mƒìs tulkojam Steam versiju.
lv.q4: Es atradu kƒº≈´du vienƒÅ no tulkojumiem. Kur es varu par to zi≈Üot?
lv.a4:
Discord serverƒÅ üîπÔ∏ômistakes kanalƒÅ.
